defender.translation[0].definitions[0].d: one of the players in a game such as football who has to defend their team’s goal from the opposing team
defender.translation[0].definitions[0].e: It’s his fourth season as an Arsenal defender.
defender.translation[0].definitions[1].d: someone who defends a particular idea, belief, person etc
defender.translation[0].definitions[1].e: He presented himself as a defender of democracy.
